modules.description: Provides functions to configure visual styles with distinct color and transparency settings. Works with graphical rendering contexts to apply predefined style configurations. Used to set up light-themed content overlays and fully or partially transparent background layers.

Sets the background color using a named color or a hexadecimal string. Operates on string inputs to apply visual styling. Used to dynamically change interface backgrounds based on user preferences or system themes.

Provides methods to hide, show, and style the status bar on mobile devices. Works with boolean flags to control visibility and string values to set the style. Used to customize the user interface during app startup or in response to user interactions.

Configures visual styles with color and transparency settings, applying them to graphical contexts for content overlays and background layers. Supports named colors and hex strings to set background colors dynamically. Allows for light-themed interfaces and fully or partially transparent backgrounds. Enables responsive UI adjustments based on user or system preferences.
